Rezi/svelte-gestures

Collection of gesture recognizers for Svelte

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Svelte components for UI and animation built with Tailwind CSS and FramerMotion
  • Turns touchpad or touchscreen gestures into custom desktop actions on Linux
  • contactless gesture and voice control tool for hands-free device use
  • Svelte UI components you can copy, customize, and drop into your app
  • Keyboard interface for mouse manipulation
  • Library for building editable websites in Svelte
  • compiler for building fast web apps with reactive components
  • Keyboard for Android with swipe gestures for symbols
  • Node-based UI libraries for React and Svelte, ready to use and customize
